page.title: 15A TYPICAL WEEK DAY
page.content:
I get up at 8.00am and so does Paul my brother. My dad has already taken the dog for a walk and my mum has got the breakfast ready. Then I get ready for school. We go to school at 8.40am. We work till 12.00 noon, and then we have lunch. We start work again at 1.30pm and finish school at 3.30. My mum has come home from work and I go out to play.My dad gets home from work at 5.00pm and we have dinner. After dinner I go out to play,go swimming or go to Cubs. I go to bed before 9.00.
{A TYPICAL SUNDAY} On Sunday I get up at about 9.00am and have my breakfast. Then I play till dinner time. In the afternoon we go to my grandma's and play with my cousins. After tea we come back and have a bath and do my spellings. I have some supper and go to bed.{TIMOTHY PREVOST.
